cast.original_title: The Last Letter from Your Lover
cast.overview: A young journalist in London becomes obsessed with a series of letters she discovers that recounts an intense star-crossed love affair from the 1960s.
cast.title: The Last Letter from Your Lover

details.biography: Rachel trained at the Royal Welsh College of Music and Drama. She has performed on stage in Romeo and Juliet, Blithe Spirit and The School for Scandal, among others. Her recent television and film credits include Alfonso Cuarón's Disclaimer staring Cate Blanchette and Kevin Kline, Chernobyl , Apartment 7a , Augustus and Dodger. She played Vicky Turner in The Archers . Rachel has worked extensively in computer games, audiobooks, BBC Radio Drama and BBC Radio Comedy. Recently she voiced Nan in animation series Mojo Swaptops, various characters including Raven Leader in the new Netflix animation series 'Hilda' and has voiced characters for Sherlock Holmes the Awakened, Elden Ring, Warhammer 40,000 Darktide, The Empress in Amnesia: Rebirth and also key parts in the long awaited video games 'Star Wars: Outlaw', 'Total War 3: Thrones of Britannia', 'Divinity: Original Sin II', 'Fable 3', 'Dragon Age II' and 'Dragon Age lll'.
details.name: Rachel Atkins
